column1: Head of Art ( Director / Associate Director ) - Gaming Industry
column2: 1. Lead, manage, and inspire design teams, fostering creativity and innovation in the creation of 3D art assets. 2. Provide guidance, feedback, and mentorship to design team members, empowering them to reach their full potential and contribute to the success of the team. 3. Collaborate with the game development team to define art styles and visual requirements for new projects, ensuring alignment with the overall creative vision. 4. Oversee the creation of 3D models, textures, animations, and other assets, ensuring that they meet technical and aesthetic standards. 5. Utilize specialized skills in Maya, 3ds Max, Blender, Substance Painter, Vray, Autodesk 3ds Max, and other relevant software to produce high-quality art assets. 6. Develop and maintain art pipelines, tools, and processes to optimize workflow efficiency and asset quality. 7. Stay informed about industry trends and emerging technologies in 3D art production, incorporating new techniques and tools as appropriate. 8. Work closely with other departments, including design, engineering, and production, to ensure seamless integration of art assets into the game engine. 9. Provide regular progress updates to senior management, highlighting achievements, challenges, and areas for improvement. 10. Foster a collaborative and inclusive team culture, encouraging creativity, innovation, and continuous learning among team members. 11. Lead by example, demonstrating a strong work ethic, attention to detail, and a commitment to excellence in all aspects of art production Educational Qualification / Work Experience & Skills : Bachelors degree in Art, Design, Animation, or related field. 12+yrs with Minimum of 5 years of experience in 3D Art Production for games, with at least 2 years in a leadership or management role. Proficiency in industry-standard 3D modelling and animation software, such as Maya, 3ds Max, Blender, or equivalent. Strong understanding of game development processes, including asset optimization, performance considerations, and platform requirements. Excellent communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively lead and motivate a team. Creative vision and artistic talent, with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating immersive gaming experiences. Strong organizational and problem-solving abilities, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Experience working in the iGaming industry or a similar fast-paced, deadline-driven environment is a plus. Knowledge of shader programming, rigging, or other technical art skills is desirable but not required
column11: 3D modelling, 3d modeling, c#, 3ds max, texturing, graphic designing, 3d animation, adobe after effects, photoshop, unity3d, game development, illustrator

column2: JOB ADVERTISEMENT Are you a highly motivated Business Development Executive looking to take that next step in your career to Create, Lead and Drive growth for an International Startup?  About Us Petitepeds is an Australian Shoe Retail brand with a focus on entering the Indian/Asian market.  The company is at an inflection point where our focus is on enabling true global scalability.  Hence, we are looking for a stellar performer to round out our team, and to drive PetitePeds through its next phase of evolution. What is on Offer? ??New Business Focused Role ??Attractive remuneration for the ideal candidate ??Flexible working arrangements ??Realistic Sales Targets ??Domestic Travel opportunities. What We Require ??A true, hands-on sales professional with proven skills to identify and cultivate new Business opportunities and partnerships.  ??Develop and execute strategic plans to meet and exceed sales targets, including market research, competitor analysis, and pricing strategies. ??Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and proposals that effectively communicate PetitePeds value proposition. ??Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, and customer support, to align strategies and deliver exceptional value to clients. ??Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activities to provide valuable insights and recommendations. ??Atleast 5 year?? experience in a Business Development/ Procurement/Purchasing/ Retail Business role ??Experience in the Retail/ Shoe Industry will be highly regarded.  ??Computer Literacy and confidence in using CRM and WMS software programs. ??Tertiary Education in a relevant field If this sounds like the role for you, please don?? hesitate to apply. To apply online please click the ??pply??button and forward your CV along with a Cover Letter outlining your relevant experience of the selection criteria.  Email address: ca.asr77@gmail.com *Recruitment Agency applications will not be entertained.
column11: Sales And Marketing, Field Sales, B2B Sales, B2B Marketing, B2B, Corporate Sales

column2: Evaluation Metric -1 (Education /Technical skills &Behavioral focused)          Plus two / Diploma     Strong verbal communication     Exposure to minimum 1 digitizing applications English communication skills     High technical aptitude and Strong attention to organization and detail     Self-motivated and self-managed approach with a high degree of problem-solving ability     A team-oriented approach to problem-solving     Good in MS CIT, Tally ERP9, Adobe Photoshop, Must have experience in Adobe illustrator, InDesign, Corel draw, Wilcom(E2,E3).     Operating Systems: -windows98 / 2000 / XP / Vista / 7Ultimate / 8 / 10.         Evaluation Metric -2 KRA PERFORMANCE (Business Focused)          Completely understand the Customers Requirements     Collaborate with team members to achieve better results     Self-motivated with a results-driven approach Must have Knowledge of fabrics, colors, textiles and promotional products     Continue to learn new concepts and skills     Coordinate with multiple teams to provide thorough, engaging, and high conversion customer experience     Design and produce high quality complex online ads     Pay attention to the detailed aspects of an ad to ensure high accuracy in copy, layout and technical execution.     Complete assigned volume of work within established deadlines         Keyskills          SMM         Desired candidate profile     Qualification: Graduates

column2: This role exists to aid and support the business development and specification efforts while at the same time showcasing and impressing upon both project and retail customers the various brand pillars of 1) Heritage 2)Technology 3)Luxury 4) Performance and 5)Sustainability thereby converting potential customers into leads and ultimately sales at Kohler Studio.                 Roles & Responsibilities:                     Display and product interaction touchpoint for customers and consumers                     Lead generation - Convert Walk-ins into leads                     Luxury positioning - Strengthen the perception of brand Kohler as a luxury brand                     Showcase trends/stories - To have knowledge of the prevailing design trends                     Relationship management - Excellent relationship management with influencers and end consumers                         Skills and Knowledge:                 1-3 years in luxury brands as showroom staff or hospitality staff             Worked with AutoCAD and other design software like Adobe Photoshop/Corel Draw and 3DS Max             Strong communication skills             Customer centricity               Sound brand knowledge, particularly in the luxury marketplace.               Microsoft Office skills required, SAP skills a plus
